name: The Naughty List (HelmetNotIncluded)
description:
The Naughty List:

Santa has checked his list twice. He knows you've been the naughtiest of the naughty. Can you use your grinch-ness  to survive the  long Christmas nights?

Thank you for playing V0.01 of the Naughty List!  In its current state, the game's balancing may feel off but will be fine tuned in future updates!

Full Release Christmas(ish) 2023!
